author: Press Association reporter, Press Association reporter
title: 'The government will do whatever it takes to help you put food on the table': Boris Johnson's letter to the UK in full
description: 'If too many people become seriously unwell at one time, the NHS will be unable to cope,' the prime minister writes
content:
Boris Johnson is writing to every household in the UK to urge the public to obey the lockdown and stay home during the coronavirus national emergency.
Here is his letter in full:
I am writing to you to update you on the steps we are taking to combat coronav… [+2952 chars]
